translations: （Sola）人名；（英、俄、芬、西、葡、意、罗、瑞典）索拉

sentences.sentence: Sola, of course you must come with us!
sentences.translation: 苏拉，你当然必须和我们一起走！

sentences.sentence: JOHN CARTER: Several days later, Sola came to me with a look of great concern.
sentences.translation: 约翰·卡特：几天后，苏拉眼神中充满焦虑的向我走来。

sentences.sentence: SOLA: John Carter, that woman will be saved for the great games that are held by our people.
sentences.translation: 约翰·卡特，由我们的人民持有的大运动会，那个女人将被保存。
